name: Unstabled 2: Horses Vs Pugs
description:
Unstabled 2: Horses Vs Pugs is a strategy game about horses fighting pugs. The goal of the game is to destroy your opponent either by directly face smashing them or by tilting the board and letting them slide off.

(alas, face smashing doesn't work. rip.)

This game Features! 

Amazing Characters! 

GRONALD!(you have no idea how much he charges per hour)

BOG witch! (Our moms made us add her... I guess she's alright 👍) 

We wanted our Cat Misty to take part but instead she was busy releasing a track on bandcamp https://m1stycat.bandcamp.com/track/heart-and-the-soul

We aren't shy about showing off the game play! 

Those are real virtual horses! 

We Let Pugs Drive and NO we didn't teach them how! 

I know what your thinking "Unstabled"? Your thinking that's not THAT original BUT the gameplay loop speaks for itself! Plus our Artist is next to none!
